page.title: 13ANNUAL EVENTS CONTINUED
page.content: There is a Dog Show which includes classes for pedigree and working dogs as well as family events such as 'the dog with the waggiest tail'.Donkeys are brought in for a{Donkey Derby where local people ride the donkeys and betting is keen if not extravagant Porlock Teams build their own rafts from things like oil drums to enter in the{Raft Race}from nearby Porlock Weir to Bossington Beach.Often rafts,fan- tastically decorated,are not seaworthy and sink to everyone's amusement.Each year a{Pantomime}is written and produced involving lots of people acting,singing,making costumes and painting scenery.It plays to capacity audiences,mainly local in January and visitors in August.
